work.name: Cyth Systems, Inc.
work.summary: LabVIEW, Circuit Debugging, FPGA, Embedded Firmware
highlights: Design, develop, and manufacture embedded test and measurement devices for clients in medical, energy, and research sectors for both in-field and laboratory environments
Plan, implement, and test high-throughput device drivers in FPGA gateware, using protocols such as I2C and SPI
Design and validate digital and analog circuitry in complex, mixed-signal systems
Author Functional Design Specification, Operation/Performance Qualification, Factory Acceptance Test, etc. documents to facillitate the systems engineering process
Take a lead role on client projects and participate in product development from ideation through to deployment and maintenance
